extendedInfo.description: Start your own tattoo studio and acquire the arts that get under the skin! Create your own style and expand your studio to become the greatest one in town!FREE and FULL-FEATURED (including Ads)!Features:- casual business simulation with classic âtycoonâ-style gameplay- 6 scenarios with more than 50 challenging tasks- individualize your tattoo studio with a multitude of furnishings and fixtures- manage employees and expand your business- minigames with dynamic difficulty- hard-rocking music and sound effects- HD-graphics for high-resolution displays- App2SDLook behind the scenes of the tattoo culture and build your own tattoo empire! Set up a perfectly furnished studio and prove your skills at handling your employees and tattoo machine! Improve your reputation and squeeze money out of your customers by fulfilling their wishes and offering individual advice, refreshing drinks, comfortable sofas and the trendiest t-shirts! Create the most impressive tattoos by designing new patterns and by improving your equipment! Let skilled employees give you a hand and manage your employees and make best use of their abilities! Work your way up from a backyard parlour owner to the scene's most successful tattoo artist and become a tattoo tycoon!* Xperia PLAY optimized *http://www.handy-games.comhttp://www.facebook.com/handygameshttp://www.twitter.com/handy_games

reviews.title: really fun
reviews.comment: get the hang of it really quickly, fun, time passing game. could use better descriptions/explanations but luckily i caught on well. my fave game atm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing and fun
reviews.comment: I love this game so much....ive played it 2 times on 2 different phones its that good! Should bring out a second verson of it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Amazing game, good gameplay, sufficient levels, on top of tht totally free without ne net access or unnecesary downloads. Keep it up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great :-)
reviews.comment: Super fun game. Simple but addictive. I had no tech problems. I recommend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: It sounded like it would be fun but the game freezes up when giving a tattoo then unfreezes after about 5 to 15 sec. Which messes up and I get a failed tattoo.uninstalling this game
reviews.author: Jeff Branco

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Fun little game. The tattooing mechanic is awesome. The only criticism I have is with the decorating. Needs more freedom with placing items.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved it. Spent last few days of my pregnancy unable to move so defiantly saved me from complete boredom. Amazing game y
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun But Hard
reviews.comment: I\'m on the 3rd shop and you\'re asking me to get 10 tattoo\'s in four days! I don\'t have money and everyone hates my store because I can\'t purchase stuff for rep. This is impossible so unless you fix this HUGE setback, I\'m never touching this game again.
reviews.author: Cameron Morgan

reviews.title: Save game feature needs work.
reviews.comment: Not a bad game, pretty fun, actually, but definitely needs some work as far as saving goes. Make sure you save the game before you quit, because the auto-save feature sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Pretty fun. Great way to make time pass by quickly. Working great on my Galaxy S3

reviews.comment: Game is glitched on Random items in random places. Can\'t use items or sell them sometimes\tPlz fix

reviews.comment: Pretty fun. Ads at the bottem are a little close to the check mark and x. But that is not a big deal. Tasks are basicly mini games guitar hero style.

reviews.title: Awesome Game
reviews.comment: Can someone tell me Why is it on the last Stage when your challenge is to have a reputation of 1700, my reputation doesn\'t go up or down when im at 1600? I buy high rep stuff like the palm tree or the glass with skulls in it but nothing makes it go higher!

reviews.title: Truly addictive game
reviews.comment: It\'s a fabulous game and one of the best casual game I have ever played. I think you should make a sequel of this game tattoo tycoon 2...

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very smart and fun for an android phone game. very fun and makes hours seem like a few minutes. Wish there were larger areas and more items. Maybe a different character color but all in all very fun.
